metadata.summary: Connect to Cato Networks API to ingest security events from the Cato events feed into LimaCharlie
metadata.primary_use_case: Ingest network security events from Cato Networks SASE platform for unified visibility and detection

extracted_apis.path: lc_adapter cato client_options.identity.installation_key=$INSTALLATION_KEY client_options.identity.oid=$OID client_options.platform=json client_options.sensor_seed_key=$SENSOR_NAME client_options.hostname=$SENSOR_NAME apikey=$API_KEY accountid=$ACCOUNT_ID
extracted_apis.description: Deploy Cato Networks adapter to fetch logs from Cato API events feed
